title: Khloe and Kourtney Kardashian's kids play with fancy Bentley power wheels
text:
Saturday is family day for the Kardashian crew.

Khloe, 35, and Kourtney, 40, took their daughters for a spin in an electric toy car.

Kourtney playfully scolded Penelope, 7, for 'texting and driving' as she could be seen handling an iPad before picking up her 1-year-old cousin True.

Fancy fun day: Saturday is family day for the Kardashian crew as Khloe and Kourtney took their daughters Penelope, 7, and True, 1, for a spin in an electric toy car

The small convertible toy car is made by Supersports and retails for $350.

The toy is a scale replica of luxury car with all of the authentic logos and lights, real rubber tires , a working suspension and an MP3 input port on the dash.

It also has a remote control so parents can redirect their little ones if they go off track.

The reality TV star's sisters, Kim, Kendall and Kylie, weren't involved in the family outing.

Teach them young! Kourtney playfully scolded Penelope for 'texting and driving' as she could be seen handling an iPad before picking up her cousin True

Baby Bentley: The small convertible toy car is made by Supersports and retails for $350

Mama bear: Khloe Kardashian, 35, waited on the corner with her little one

Replica: The toy is a scale replica of luxury car with all of the authentic logos and lights, real rubber tires , a working suspension and an MP3 input port on the dash

But Kim Kardashian West, 38, did take to Instagram to share a family photo with her kids earlier on Saturday.

In the picture, Kim's daughter Chicago, 21 months, son Saint, 3, and daughter North, 6, can be seen posing at their $14 million, 4,500-acre ranch in Wyoming.

The 38-year-old KUWTK star also has a five-month-old son Psalm with her third husband Kanye West, whom she wed in 2014 after two years of dating.

Kourtney recently got back with her 26-year-old model boyfriend, Younes Bendjima.

'Squad': Kim Kardashian West, 38, shared a recent portrait of herself with (from L-R) daughter Chicago, 21 months, son Saint, 3, and daughter North, 6, can be seen posing at their $14 million, 4,500-acre ranch in Wyoming

In August 2018, TMZ reported that Kourtney broke up with Younes in July after he cheated on her - though a second source maintains the problem was distance.

It's been rumored that Khloe is considering getting back together with her ex, Tristan Thompson, 28.

Khloe and Tristan split after the NBA player cheated on her just weeks before the birth of their child True.
description: Saturday is family day for the Kardashian crew. Kourtney playfully scolded Penelope, 7, for 'texting and driving' as she could be seen handling an iPad before picking up her 1-year-old cousin True.
